jobDescription: The HubSpot Customer Operations and Analytics team is looking for a Data Analyst to join our rapidly growing team. We are a group of operational and analytical professionals driving business decisions with data. We partner with senior leadership across both the Customer Success and the greater HubSpot team to solve complex reporting and data challenges. Primary responsibilities include supporting our teams data infrastructure, developing advanced reporting functionality and providing analytical insights into the performance of the Customer Success organization.  This is a unique opportunity to hone technical expertise with new technologies across multiple data sources, all in the context of complex, high-priority business needs. You have the appetite to gain a full grasp of HubSpots business, along with the inner workings of the Customer Success organization. You enjoy working in a supportive team environment and collaborating with your peers. You have advanced SQL and database skills and enjoy creating, improving and automating data resources, reporting dashboards and analytical projects. You are a collaborative problem solver who will work closely with members of Business Intelligence, Account Management, Consulting, Education, Finance and Customer Operations.Responsibilities include:
